Instruction: 'Mince the garlic cloves and dice the jalapeno pepper (remove seeds for less heat if desired).'
In a food processor, combine the black beans, minced garlic, diced jalapeno pepper, lime juice, cumin, salt, and black pepper.'
Pulse until smooth, scraping down the sides as needed.'
'Add chopped cilantro and pulse a few more times to incorporate.'
'Transfer the dip to a serving bowl.'
'Serve with tortilla chips or vegetable sticks.'
